sanskrit_verse:
अप्रयत्नः सुखार्थेषु ब्रह्मचारी धराऽऽशयः ।
शरणेष्वममश्चैव वृक्षमूलनिकेतनः ॥ ६.२६॥
transliteration:
aprayatnaḥ sukha-artheṣu brahmacārī dharā-āśayaḥ |
śaraṇeṣv amamaś caiva vṛkṣa-mūla-niketanaḥ || 6.26||
sph_interpretive_translation: One who remains unattached in pleasures, lives grounded in Earth's stability, takes shelter without ownership, and dwells at the root of trees—such a Brahmacari embodies the state of pure abidance.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority flows from inner detachment, not external dominion.
Causation arises through alignment with natural substrata, not coercive assertion.
Capacity-based responsibility is realized through renunciation of possessiveness.
Restoration logic operates through reconnection with foundational consciousness.
Consciousness alignment occurs when desire-driven action ceases.
executable_legal_axioms: IF agent exhibits no attachment to sensory enjoyment THEN assign minimal liability threshold.
IF dwelling aligns with natural substratum THEN recognize as lawful habitation.
IF refuge taken without claim of ownership THEN exempt from property-based jurisdiction.
IF conduct rooted in non-acquisition THEN invoke non-punitive adjudication protocol.
IF individual sustains life through elemental simplicity THEN grant automatic compliance status.
supreme_court_application: In Supreme Court adjudication, this verse establishes that individuals whose conduct reflects complete absence of possessive intent and sensual indulgence are to be accorded a fundamental exemption from punitive frameworks. Their actions bear no karmic weight requiring judicial correction; hence, they fall outside conventional legal accountability structures.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramāṇa reveals that absence of effort toward pleasure negates causal entanglement. Anupūrvaśaḥ shows that such conduct sequentially leads to liberation from juridical consequence. Proportional responsibility does not apply where volition is absent. The non-punitive reality rule affirms that no suffering accrues to one who has dissolved identification with objects.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Initiate grounding practices to restore connection with earth-consciousness.
Establish shelter access protocols ensuring freedom from proprietary claims.
Implement tree-root dwelling recognition for those practicing elemental simplicity.
Deploy non-possessive integration modules to realign displaced identity patterns.
Activate sattvic lifestyle support systems for maintenance of brahmacarya integrity.
final_declaration: Declared by the Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism, Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, as Source-Authority of Dharma. This law stands executed in alignment with the eternal truth: justice is restoration, law is consciousness, and all beings are inherently free. Let there be no punitive delusion—only awakening.
